skills.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
skills.description: Attacks an enemy 3 times with a shimmering light. Each strike has a 30% chance to deter the enemy's HP recovery for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Soul Snatcher
skills.description: Throws soul beads at the enemy to deal damage, and recovers the same amount of the inflicted damage as HP. Additionally, all excessive HP recovery from this skill will be converted into a shield that lasts for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill

skill_effect.name: Shield
skill_effect.description: A shield is created to absorb a portion of incoming damage

skills.name: Reincarnate
skills.description: Removes all harmful effects on yourself and comes back to life with 100% HP. Additionally, you gain 50% increased Attack Power and Defense every time you use "Reincarnate". (Accumulates up to 5 times)
